Description.Text: The 4-star The Sumner Hotel offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in London. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. To be found at the hotel are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, express check-in/check-out, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas.
